tdvz4p9knbkhSlBQUeYDOQ.text: I was so excited to try this place as cajun food and crawfish and gulf shrimp special to my heart. The meal began great with no wait and a very friendly and encouraging hostess who sat us promptly and explained the concept. We ordered the crawfish, clams, shrimp and snow crab. Each arrived at different times in plastic bags but within 20 minutes from ordering. I am a chef, so maybe I see things that others don't. The shrimp were served head on which should be reserved. for only fresh caught as the brains spoil within a day and these had been spoiled a few days ago. The heavy spiced sauce covered the taste. The clams were good and tasty but 8 shells per pound had no clam inside which was a letdown. I scoured the bottom of the bag hoping to find the missing clams to no avail, they must be in the boil pot which made me disappointed to psy for just shells. The snow crab was mushy and does not pare well with the over spiced sauces, my ordering fault. Our server was friendly but we never saw her again after taking iur order but maybe they share tables as we were serviced by 3 others. All in all a unique idea but lacking in quality fot the price paid. I almost want to try again as I love crab and shrimp boils but to spend $60 for 2 to walk away hungry and question the quality is too much for me. I wish them well but will not be back or reccomend.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. Mel getting his bib on. Still made a mess of his shirt.

29P3G8W27wMISsG4AOoZvQ.text: If you are in the mood for some seafood on the west side of town, this is a great place to go. The food is really good and tasty. The wait staff was really friendly and quick to fill your needs.   The only downside is all the plastic they use on the table. I am not the most environmental person, but damn it's a lot of plastic.   Over all food is great, will come back for more.

5_sYKKH7lh8mRmFQBlH18Q.text: I want to preface this review by saying that I give reviews when I've had horrible and superb experiences (yelp and google) or if it's non service but the food is amazing. So... my friend and I went to Hot and Juicy (Glendale, AZ) on the 4th. The host was great and we expected a wait time of at least 30 min so we went across the way to have a drink at The Yard House. We were there 5 min, before we ordered a drink, and received a text that our table was ready. We went back to Hot and Juicy and got seated in a spot we really liked. Our server's name was Aquan and I have to say that it was great service from start to finish. Very personable and attentive... explained the menu with no hesitation and even suggested a few things. We never felt rushed, even though it was pretty busy, and never had to wait for service. We made sure to let his manager Bri? know of his exceptional service. I usually go to Angry Crab but after the service we received, and the Hot and Juicy sauce mix, this will be my go to place! I always like to acknowledge great food and ESPECIALLY great service!

We enjoyed our experience and we couldn't have been more pleased with the service. Our server Kyanna did a fantastic job staying attentive to our needs and for stepping in at the right time every time. (We were a needy group, but she came through with a smile and a "sure, no problem") definitely coming back when we visit again from LA.

x8_wYL_6g0rpCZvBdQMWCw.text: I love seafood and definitely am thankful for a place like this on the west side. It's almost as good as Angry Crab. However, I do wish they did a way better job at eliminating their single-use plastic. The only reusable item they bring to the table is the buckets the food comes in. After that, literally everything is plastic and styrofoam. From their table covers they use and throw after EVERY table to their utensils. I can't imagine how much they contribute to plastic waste. Which is why I haven't been there since.

UcVa61KfJV3wcuFDxW3tHg.text: If I could leave NO STARS I WOULD LITERALLY LEAVE NO STARS . I frequently order from this place , a month ago I came here they got my order wrong , I came back here today go home and there is LITERALLY NO SHRIMP . I live a good 25 minutes away and I had to come back for them to accuse me of eating it and saying they are 100% sure the shrimp was in there when clearly it's not . I opened it up at home and there was no shrimp , I'm extremely upset at the situation instead of offering an apology they acused me of eating it and offered 1/2 pound of shrimp , when I payed for a FULL POUND OF SHRIMP . f-GqKTFAu-xduDpkXpK03g.text: We had great service and our fresh crawfish hit the spot and satisfied our craving that we've been having! Wings and fries were also really delicious too. So glad there is one here near our hotel!

kydPeHNgdJyANJqnHyAucQ.text: There is a long wait, so be prepared . The food was phenomenal and was worth it. The Waite staff can definitely stand some retraining . I understand it is busy but the person should know which tables they are working. Trust me this will cut your tips.

_4VvGtm6gVMFuRUqekt8qw.text: Horrible service. Period.... Hostess needs to learn some manners!!! This is not how you conduct business in an area where there are so many eateries. Never coming back!

jo1N5Rg2K3JETinfR8MJOg.text: Wow I am almost out of breath. Never been here before. Got seated right away the staff is nice they explain everything. We got a pound of shrimp and crab legs with corn and sausage.   We went with baby spice and it was still a little spicy. Man this was good flavors I have never experienced before.  Get white rice let the juices soak up the rice then prepare for awesome.   This is one of those places I am afraid to come back I liked it so much I am afraid it won't be as good.  Come here now.... super fun experience not sure if its first date fun but awesome.

NHDhTdq243_NcOEBNSYGsA.text: Let me say this first, we didn't have a bag of seafood, which seems to be their main item.  I'm not a crawfish fan, and don't like crab in the shell (unless they're stone crabs, which most places around here do not carry) or oysters.  That being said, I also have an issue with food that can look at me.  Anyway, hubby really wanted to check out this place, so we decided to try it.  However, since the baskets are also on the menu, I would assume they should be just as tasty as anything else.  We started with the corn fritters, which are more like corn nuggets.  I think of fritters as being a little bigger...but, they were very good.  Like little bites of corny goodness.  They were better without the mayo sauce they served with them.  We both ended up getting the fried shrimp baskets...hubby with their cajun fries, me with regular fries.  Now, herein lies the problem we both seemed to have.  The shrimp batter is really crunchy, but there's way too much of it.  The shrimp are butterflied, which flattens them out.  All I tasted was "crunch".  The shrimp definitely weren't being tasted and, unfortunately, the batter had no flavor.  I attempted to peel off some of the batter, but that didn't seem to help much...still no flavor.  The fries were decent, but hubby didn't realize his would be so spicy.    That being said, the service was good.  Our waitress was very friendly and fun to talk to.

cmONzOsgmTNhRi6e1HP_bQ.text: Tried to eat here 3 nights in a row, they told us we couldn't make a reservation. So we finally tried waiting and were quoted 45 minutes to an hour. An hour and a half later and they still hadn't seated us. Pretty ridiculous and the staff didn't seem to care about keeping us out in the cold. Awesome customer service guys  I don't even think the best seafood could make up for that.

4AZ0mZgaK30gXjsWkbXyzA.text: First time here and I love it! The sauce was very spicy and garlicky. Unfortunately there wasn't live crawfish just frozen. I recommend this place for seafood lovers. Also had their shrimp poboy and I thought it was just as good as the ones in New Orleans.

0h_ciQJDS_wZwtcFL85ahA.text: I love coming here Shelby was very attentive and super friendly. You made the experience amazing! Food was Amazing as always. Ask for Shelby she is the best!

YqD3PiEe4kP-MfiEIXJK7Q.text: I love this place. I've tried others like it and they just don't compare. I have learned to only get crab legs (they have the most meat) and the lemon pepper seasoning. It is finger licking good every time. Every. Time. It's one of our go-to places.

KpekQwcGmYfFu9GRFQlrcQ.text: Food was good. Service workers were very helpful. However, do not bring a large group. We had 13 in our party and company policy is to not split the check more than 3 ways. It took us longer to settle the check than it did to eat the meal. Hence, making what could have been a good time into a huge frustration.

tqMQ3WuBK3L2bjiqYHAwLA.text: The server Michelle with blond hair and tattoo is awesome! She is super friendly, and took care of my table really well. I'd give a 5 star if it was rating just on service from her.  The food is usually good, but there are times that it doesn't taste as good.

orjiZ3BJ9brzriaHejt-1w.text: Came on game day. Buffalo wild wings had a long wait so decided to try this place and I'm soooo glad we did! Got sat right away and food came out fast. They had game day drink specials and the food was awesome.

0L5Q5gGNmZYanH5SP4ajEA.text: My server, Crystal R, did an AWESOME job! I thought the food and beverage tasted fresh and food was prepared well. It's not very fancy, but if you crave Crawfish in the Phoenix West Valley it's a place to go. My Big issue is the majority of restaurants in this area offer a military discount due to the extremely close proximity to an Air Force Base. Bottom Line: Server is a 5, Management is a 1. Hence a 3.

_9H3Wbi9oPaUESpg1R8Y5Q.text: Such a fun place to check out. Try the shrimp and the mussels for sure! The seasoning is amazing and the smell over takes the entire restaurant. The cajun fries are totally worth the price and are spicy beyond belief! I can't wait to go back! The only reason why I couldn't give it a full 5 stars was that some of our mussels were not cooked all the way through and our bill was messed up.

_VIwA4XJfGdC6SLk2KX2Iw.text: Excellent customer service from Faith our waiter,Hot n Juicy at Westgate location. She kept making sure that we enjoyed our food and had what we needed. The food is amazing! Very flavorful! Extremely spicy ans delicious. Really recommend coming here:)

kVUApdPoFC-ezYL1Pfuz6g.text: It is rare to have restaurants like this that people needs to peel shrimps and eat crawfish in the states, but I enjoyed it so much, as the process of eating is fun as well. I went to this restaurant by myself without any hesitation, and then ordered half pound of shrimp and one pound of crawfish. The waitress is very friendly and explains the menu in detail. The food is served on table within 2 minutes, when it is a Sunday evening and the whole restaurant is already full. The spice smells terrific, and both dishes taste so good. I finished them like a hog! If you enjoy spicy food, this is definitely a must to go place!

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. Hot juicy spicy shrimp and crawfish!

bMtJz0vhXWgQbxT5ArPQrA.text: Walked in and was not greeted by hostess who was already grabbing menus to seat someone else. He looked right at me and didn't bother to say hello and continued to walk away. I was greeted immediately after with another guy who sat us down and got our waters. We got our food out pretty quick, ordered wings which our my favorite.  Normally you automatically get bibs and I did not get that. Everyone around me had bibs. You k ow hot n juicy is messy. Eating our shrimp it was under cooked slightly. It did come out pretty quick which is a first. Unfortunately we did have to send back our shrimp for being undercooked. I would hate to get sick.   The waiter did take it back and offered to get us a fresh new batch.  He also came back and offered us  some free beers on the house. Most places would just apologizes and give you a Comp or dessert.   Overall our shrimp came back over cooked but it was still a average experience

Z6MdK5k189CFOOo2NCoL0Q.text: Unique concept with a nice menu that's bundled into a great location. I had the spicy boiled crawfish and I'm very impressed with their food- great blend of flavor and quality.   Only thing that I didn't like was the service. Epic service failure.

E1Y8xmVXvdD46K2WNah1ig.text: This place isn't really anything spectacular. My wife and I went there last night and the up sell like a beast. When we walked in, the smell was disgusting. It smelled like flammable methane fart gas. Lol has to be from the spices they use. We got to the table, it took a while for the server to get there. Once there, they got our drink order and then food order as usual. Then the server changed. We still got everything we ordered, but with the change there was a little confusion.   When the food arrived, it was hot...but not juicy! It was in an inch or two of hot sauce, and you had to dredge the sauce just to find the shrimp. The seasoning they use is just too much. It's actually overkill.   I don't plan in going back. I was hoping for some solid Cajun food and got slop.  Totally not impressed!

O7vKVgFiVBYI0kRmL-QR6Q.text: So yummmmmy!!!!! Our server, Karol, was great in making recommendations for first timers. Will be coming back again . The shrimp with Potatoe was really good. I was scared and went with the least mild sauce but then decided I needed a little more kick and Karol brought me a spicer sauce! There's something for everyone

2O1pzYtxguHUUzcc1rcR2Q.text: Damn good.  Fist time here.  It's very similar to a place I go to in Fort Worth, TX.  Sit outside if it's nice and cool out

hQHMTIfuowdsn92C9r4Yyg.text: Service was terrible.  Seemed everything took 15-20 mins.  Sat at table...15 mins waitress shows up. WMGFyQ7a1yC1g5BaZVsDTw.text: this place was absolutely amazing. the wait wasn't as quick as i would've liked but our waitress was so nice and helpful and the food was incredible. we had 4 people and still had a lot of food to go home with , they're definitely not cheap with the portions. i'd love to go there again for sure.

lz44goaKZKyVs5ylqzoXWw.text: The food was good.  Had the garlic butter shrimp the first day.  Great taste... but heavy on the garlic.   Unfortunately, the waitress forgot all about me after I ate.  Waited 20 minutes- waived and tried to get their attention.  Finally had to go to the front and ask.  I liked the food through and decided to go back.  Second day they brought me a delicious looking bag of shrimp.  Said they would be right back with the setup... bucket, gloves, bib, lemons, etc.  Never came back.  Stared at my shrimp for 15 minutes.  When to the front and asked for a bucket.  Waited 10 more minutes.  As I walked out the door, the waitress yelled after me that she was just getting my bucket.  Food is a 4, Service is a 1.  Will never return.

b0JiTOgg7ACIEG_Phn0GLg.text: If your looking to dine carb friendly, Hot N Juicy is a good option. H&J is another Cajun food style restraunt. They are fairly new to the valley. My wife and I both enjoy seafood so we gave H&J a shot. She ordered the Shrimp H&J style with baby spice. As for me I had the Crawfish H&J style medium heat with sausage add-on. We also ordered the chicken wing appetizer. We had asked if the chicked wings were breaded and we're told no. When we recieved them they were breaded. We just pulled the breadding off and ate them. The wings were good and cooked throughout. I didnt like that they had no seasoning on them. My wifes shrimp came out and half were good the other half were mushy. (Sign of old or refrozen shrimp.) The staff was great about it and brought out another half pound that were good. The crawfish was good as well. Well seasoned and tasty. Beware of ordering the crafish though. You are going to put in some worj if you order these mud bugs because you have to peel the armor of a shell off of it. But the taste is worth it. We liked H&J but the price was a little steep for what we got. Not a bad place at all though. I would definitely go back.

HxqDhteZK_CI6XMBCgJsgw.text: Got the sampler (can't remember the real name) with crawfish, shrimp and andouille sausage. Hot n Juicy mild. The prices were slightly high for me but not for the location it was in. Great concept, kind of different for a place so far away from an ocean, but nonetheless completely enjoyable.

_3gSRamU7gmoSArUqmo9-g.text: really enjoyed going to this place  but they have a very limited bar menu, especially for the location at west gate where there are so many place with a larger drink menu.  Food is always good, i mean that why you right   for the seafood , lol.

xVN8n2izGaj-THkmaP4ppQ.text: Not sure why the low reviews...but, we have always had a great experience when dining here.  Food is on point.  Fresh, hot, and the waitresses are always helpful.

xsshQl83nmLd-_gEmJenMw.text: This was our first time here, so didn't know what to expect. Our waitstaff was fast to get our drink order first. She explained how this restaurant serves their food. It was different in that you get no plates, or dinner wear, but you do get a plastic bib, and a roll of paper towels on the table. The food is served in plastic bags. We ordered clams, and shrimps in butter and garlic sauce which were wonderful, along with an order of sweet potato fries, and a catfish and Cajun fries basket. The only suggestion to this restaurant is to add some type of salad to help balance out the food pyramid.

CKf3QlK_qfdFMYsC13dJfA.text: Best seafood in the country. Try the Hot n Juicy spice but beware, medium is REALLY hot  but not uncomfortable.  Shout out to Lynnsey! She's the best! Hope I get her table next time I'm here  (which will probably be in a couple of days).

tgwEkJs4pCbxkzKy3JAJjw.text: COCKROACHES!!!! While having dinner my fiance kept saying she felt something crawling on the back of her neck, I looked and didn't see anything I told her I thought it was the bib that they have given us to wear. About 10 minutes later she says I feel it again look in my hair, there it was a giant cockroach!!! Our wait staff was good but The management was absolutely horrible never once was I approached by management never once did they stop by the table to say sorry all our waiter did was offer to give us 50% off our bill. I called later to complain and the manager by the name of Jillian told me that was fair enough and to call corporate and complain! Nice customer service skills!! I will never return & I will be spreading the word!! Thanks

XPExeAN6pNjt3iV0lSwNOw.text: First time there and will doubtfully be back. Food was ok, but service was non existent.   Went there for a quick bite before we went shopping. Shown to a table and forgotten about. Server showed up a few minutes later and asked if we had been served.  When the food showed up, the server checked the tag on the bag, but did not check if everything was in there. (Potatoes and Corn) Took 5 minutes to flag someone down and let them know. But she didn't do anything about it and let our server know. She came and asked what was missing with an attitude.  When she came back with the potatoes and corn, we were pretty much done with our crawfish and shrimp. Then she asked why we were not using a bucket for our shell pointing to the pile on the table, ummm, first time there, didn't know about the bucket. Again, attitude.  Food was OK, having spent 5 years on the Gulf Coast, I have had way better, but this is Arizona so I will give them credit.

jIfDJmvzTVdDvBYAADt3Jg.text: If I could give zero stars I would! We were seated quickly, then sat for at least 10 minutes before a waiter made contact with us. Ordered 2 beers and one pound crawfish. Took awhile for beers to arrive. We then waited 30+ minutes before our server came to our table but only because we signalled to him. He apologized for our wait. Another 15+ minutes passed with no further contact. My son chased after the server and said we'd just like our check and we were no longer interested in crawfish. Paid bill - no tip - and went to front of house where my son asked for the managet. He told her our story to which she replied "Oh I only manage the front of the house, not the kitchen." WHAT??? She then asked if we'd stay if she gave us 2 pounds of crawfish for free. Um.....no, we've been here over an hour and have not been served what we ordered right off the bat. We went to In'n'Out Burger and had a delicious meal that was ready in 5 minutes even though it was very crowded!

JvUtS45rXQqaf-WhZ9z6Bg.text: I was with a party of four and arrived at 8pm. We were told there was a 20 minute wait, which we were OK with. We ended up being seated about 30 minutes after waiting... which again was OK. The service seemed OK for the first 30 minutes but it progressively worsened. We ordered 8 pounds of various things (excited to try everything). About thirty minutes after being seated, we got an order of soft crab and a pound of clams. The clams were delicious! About 20 minutes later, we got 2 pounds of crawfish. Again, the crawfish was delicious. The seasoning they use is amazing! We ordered extra spicy and while it was very spicy, the taste was extremely flavorful and perfect for those who like very spicy food. More than an hour had passed from the moment we were first seated and we had yet to get the rest of the food we had ordered. When we asked about it we were told that there had been a ticket mishap and the rest of our food wasn't being made... this didn't make sense since a couple of the things we had ordered made it to our table. We were told it would be a few minutes. Again, more than 15 minutes passed and by that point we were extremely frustrated and disappointed. The servers seemed disorganized and kept asking what they had already brought and what we were still missing. We ended up canceling the remaining of our order and although the server said she would be speaking to the manager, there was no compensation or apology from the manager. Although the food (that we got to taste) was fantastic, the service was a shame!! The waitresses were nice (but couldn't get the job done). The overall experience was bad. We were there to try various foods and instead left disappointed because they failed to bring out all of the food we ordered within almost a two-hour time frame. To top it off, when the bill came, we were being charged for food that never made it to our table.

qtzFIQaMpOz_q8CfyaQAkg.text: Had a pound of crawfish and crab legs, my husband wanted to try it out for his birthday. Let me tell you..IT WAS HONESTLY THE WORSE SERVICE EVER!! When we first got there we were greeted right away and seated quickly but after that it was not a good experience.  1st off we ordered regular crawfish and not frozen but they brought frozen and it is put directly on bag what was ordered. We would have advised them of the mistake but once they were brought to us no one checked on us for about 20 minutes and then Ashley came to our table to let us know she would be taking over for the guy that was 1st waiting on us.  we also had some beers because they had penny specials since there was a Cards game going on but they never came to check on us or ask if we needed anything...I actually wanted to order something else but by the time someone came around I just wanted to leave already.  Right behind the booth we sat at was the POS system and although there was several people at that little station, know one would ask how it was or if we needed anything.  Definitely don't waste your time, it was our 1st time there and definitely out last!

4B0_e2-1st-pEpiESpS33w.text: Have been there several times,disappointed never have the Blue Crab! We will call on our way and see if Blue Crab is in they always seem to say, we had it the day before but sells out quickly.  Was told by Manager they get their shipment in on Fridays, went there today and low and behold no blue crab!  I ordered  my usual shrimp hot and juicy extra spicy.  Love the spice its hot but enjoyable, the only disappointing thing is the shrimp are sometimes mushy and hard to peel from their shell.   On on our last visit,told the manager about this and she stated that next time tell them not to cook too much.  Today we did tell our server who mentioned to the cooks and still had shrimp hard to peel.  That is disappointing for the price that you pay per pound, however again the sauce was hot and enjoyable.  Cajun fries are very yummy wish they were served with something other than ketsup.  A nice remoulade sauce or ranch would be awesome.  Our server Philip was excellent!  He was very attentive and provided excellent service. Would give him 5 star review.

xkDzpLQhiRK1mn63QVMP3Q.text: I came to the Glendale location with my family for Father's Day and was completely disgusted. There was a spill on the floor within minutes of us being seated. We saw three servers/employees attend to the spill. They used their bare hands to wipe the floor and pick up ice, have their bare hands all over your the dirty mop bucket and mop head. This would not have been an issue if any of them would have went to wash their hands before continuing to serve drinks and food. One of these employees was even grabbing the cups by rim with her dirty hands and serving drinks to customers in them! I did bring this to the managers attention, who seemed disinterested and blew me off by say, "don't worry" and "I got it right now" as he turned away and didn't let me finish what I was saying. He then said to the employees, "everyone wash your hand", which no one did! Needless to say, I will not be returning or recommending this establishment to anyone! I will make the extra 20 min drive to Angry Crab where the staff is friendly and sanitary and the food is better.

40-mI6an2X6t-GcKpU0Wiw.text: Great food excellence service wasn't very crowded n we had a nice meal. Would definitely go back n have dinner. I'm from Louisiana n the seafood we had was very good n fresh. See ya next time. Good luck with your new location

XTetmXcLW_FyAoJZ4sfn2w.text: Great food!! We had the shrimp with the Hot N Juicy seasoning. It was fantastic. We then ordered the clams with the Louisiana seasoning. I preferred the Hot N Juicy. We ordered extra Hot N Juicy sauce, it came out room temp. I would suggest they heat it up before serving it. I really loved how they gave you gloves to wear so your hands don't get dirty. Be prepared to have a messy meal. I also loved that I got to eat the clams with my hands as they were. That was so not proper but this restaurant isn't like that. We also ordered rolls to eat with the sauces. We ordered the soft shell crab as a side, it cam on top of fries. That was a bit too much grease for me so next time I'll just stick with one of the Juicy Cravings. Beer goes great with their food. The service was very good as well.

GUuF6JJKhaHx3KDFsZwwpQ.text: On 5/3/2015, Food was good but not great. Be prepared for a mess. Service was not very good. Had 8 people, got there early bit they would not seat us until half our group was there. Then we waited while they moved tables around to accommodate us. Went across the way from HNJ,and ordered a beer while we waited for our group to show. I guess they don't need the revenue. One couple ordered corn which hadn't arrived 45 minutes later. Requested corn from multiple people with no luck. After husband got testy, the corn was finally delivered......at end of meal. Want this type of seafood, try Joe's Crab Shack.

Zh9ZDLjIuoMww7djVsn2xA.text: I was so appalled. They give you your food in PLASTIC BAGS. No plates, no silverware, styrofoam cups, bibs, and plastic gloves. And there's just a roll of paper towels sitting there. And I was confused by everything, so I asked the server, "Do we get plates at all?" And she said "Your table's kind of your plate." Real nice. So I guess I should've known better, but at the end when I asked for a to go box, we just got another grocery bag. The food did take a long time because that place is PACKED. I don't know why, though. And it was really annoying to have to peel everything ourselves. I've never done that before so it was really difficult to do all that and barely get anything to eat after all the work you do. It was very messy. And that place is pretty expensive, so I guess I expected to be served a little classier for that amount of money. If I ever do get their food again, I would get it to go so that I can have my dinner on a plate like a civilized person.

96K99In2HJ755FWG-mu0Mw.text: We went in to try this place and no one cares it is very clear.

xfW1omtBFJZMh2qBRlr15g.text: Restuarant was about 30% full on a Tuesday evening.  Placed appetizer order for 2 dozen oysters, softshell crab, which arrived and tasted good.  King crab legs arrived and was waiting to get a bib. King crab legs were great but overall the service was poor for the amount of people that were in the restuarant.

yx_lz1ZXXpf6oo6SZVeQ5A.text: The food was delicious, I can not complain about that... but please explain to me how can you guys deliver my shrimp and make me wait 15 minutes for a side of rice. And when I explained to the tall redhead that we were still waiting for half our order, she had to nerve to give the worst attitude and say "we bring everything out fresh so you have to wait for the item to be ready" WOW I have never been spoken to like that by a server. I will have to find a new place to get my Cajun shrimp fix.

tICi212e_NYgGo6eNmYiEg.text: I was a little mad at my wife for going here with her mom first instead of me. We had just talked about going here the other day and she goes with her? I mean I love my mom to, but come on we JUST said we should go! Anyway, enough about my thoughts about my wife and lets get to my thoughts on Crawfish. We went here in the middle of the day so it wasnt that busy which was nice because we got a table right away and got the full attention of the staff. Everyone that came to our table was very nice and joked around with us so no complaints there. I dont like the Outback way of pricing which is charging for every little thing on the menu. You want fries? Boom! 3 bucks! You want butter? Boom! 2 bucks! Bread? Hahaha! If you have to ask you cant afford it. I mean I cant atleast get some fries with my shrimp or atleast 2 rolls with my crab? Its a very annoying practice that might be the main reason I will never go back. The shrimp we ordered was good and I actually liked taking the shell off myself and that goes the same for the crab. I also ordered the calamari, but for 10.99 a basket I would not recommend it. What I can about my trip is the staff was friendly, but the food and sides are expensive, plus dont go with a woman who likes to go places without you.......

wgVRUehGXf5qeIiDocjobg.text: Worse experience. Having to wait 45 min for you food to come. If you know an item is a hot seller you should plan for it, especially on a weekend

jzfzy2lZt9AJHnuXfP-wTA.text: Food is usually good, called this order to go, and the girl was extremely rude! Needed to add to my order and it was like If was killing her to put in a side of fries for my child..then I try ordering sweet tea and she said they don't give sweet teas to go..Never calling in an order... We shall see if we even bother coming in if the waitresses are going to be this rude!

dKJxYctUDgO5qJ-p_BHo-A.text: Skip this place, went there with a group of 4 before the Madonna concert....Waited an hour, and our food started coming to the table in the most unusual order...one person got a potato, one person got their shrimp without the fries. One person didn't get their dinner at all...the food was so so, not bad, not good.

YUQYWH9v3gm0zJW3T3mZlw.text: Both times I've dealt with the hostess she has been extremely unpleasant. I called in on Father's Day to see if they took reservations and she got an attitude with me and said " we don't do that you'll have to come in and put your name on the list and wait, have a nice day bye" and hung up before i could get a word in. So I decided to go somewhere else solely based on her poor attitude.  They need to put someone friendly and upbeat as the first point of contact, not someone who comes across as they hate their job and dealing with people. I can't wait until the angry crab opens in Peoria.

E06i_EP8w5TtB_Eoabqs-A.text: So, I've been going to this place pretty regularly since they opened. Sometimes for my lunch break because I work really close and sometimes bringing my family for dinner and the service has always been pretty crappy.  But the food is great so I kept going back.  Well today, I went with a friend for our lunch break we were literally the first people in the place and 40 minutes later I still didn't have my food.  Since I was on my lunch break, I needed to get back to work and after a waitress FINALLY came over I told them this.  They went to check on the food and still needed 4 more minutes - this would not leave me enough time to eat my food before having to return to work. The only thing they offered was to bag my stuff up to go when it was ready but bringing back HNJ crawfish and shrimp to my cubicle in an office didn't seem like a viable option for me. That was it. So, my friend got to slowly eat alone (in anticipation that my food would come eventually) and I literally got nothing but a 'sorry'.  I heard there's a Boiling Crab or something similar opening up in the area soon and I can't wait since I really love this style of food but am truly sick of the horrible service that this location has to offer.  I've given them many chances in hopes that the service would improve but I have definitely been let down beyond repair.

Uy1ex4jb6sqrEkwqXLhbEQ.text: The food is good but the service is horrible. They are out of everything right when they open, the wait staff doesn't know the menu, and the server asked me how to make a Bloody Mary even though it's a drink on the menu. They need a management change immediately or it will fail like the other restaurants at the Westgate.

ChIf4CjClKLhjrOc-x-5pQ.text: My little brother and I was excited to try Hot N Juicy today and it was also our first time here. We ordered 2 lbs of Louisiana style shrimp,1lb of lemon pepper clams, and 1lb of Louisiana style crawfish. Our 2lb Louisiana style shrimp came out first. I expected Louisiana style to be flavorful but instead it was flavorLESS. I asked for butter to dip my shrimp since its so flavorless and again, the butter tasted watered down. Absolutely NO FLAVOR in the butter either. The clams and crawfish came out and we set the other half of shrimp aside. The lemon pepper clams was most flavorful and delicious out of everything. As for the crawfish, no flavor as expected. Instead of the butter, we ended up dipping our shrimp and crawfish in the lemon pepper sauce since it was more tasty. The lemon pepper sauce is what gave them one star. Never coming back here again. Waste of money.

Vb-exbqH1m33NBG8hgIEcw.text: First time I had H&J was in Vegas and it was really good. I actually prefer it than Boiling Crab but then when they opened one up in Arizona one in tempe later in Glendale. I had horrible experience in both restaurants. Tempe is just hard to find parking, very long wait and food was salty. In Glendale about the same, even though west gate is a big place it can get quite pack and hard to find parking. Usually the wait is 20-30 min but sometimes can take up to an hour. My first exp at H&J in Glendale,AZ was pretty good, shrimp was on point and so was the crab but then my 2nd visit they were missing 2 orders, I ended up cancelling it. On my third visit, the waiters always forget to refill my water and my orders came in extremely late when they were about to close again I ended up cancelling it. 3rd visit same experience and on my last visit again kitchen was supposedly backed up and they didn't bring out my snow crabs. The worst part of it all  the my garlic butter shrimp was extremely dry, the meat inside felt so hard, the shells were crispy and overcooked. I had to speak to a manager and all they said was were backed up. Do yourself a favor go to Angry Crab, nice people, no to a little wait and better food. If you don't mind traveling a bit far.

Jven_R1haibrVK1ImxhlXA.text: Called ahead and was told a 40-50 minute wait to seat six. Got there and they said 45 min. Ok, not everyone was there yet. Went to the bar, ordered a Jack and Coke. Sorry no Jack. In fact, only one brand of any liquor. Some cheap bourbon instead of Jack. First thing we noticed was there was no adult supervision in the place. Just a bunch of kids serving and seating. It took an hour and a half to get a table and it was a four top that they shoved five chairs and a high chair in front of. Sure glad our sixth person was a no show. Food was ok, eating out of a plastic bag with no plate, fork or knife was an adventure. Just not one I will be repeating soon or often. Not worth the effort. Should have left after an hour wait.  I know they are newly opened, but really an hour and a half. They could have seated us at 45 minutes had they shoved two tables together. But they were waiting for another large party to leave while the were seating parties if two and four.  Customer service is clearly not a priority here. Might try them again in a year or so, if they are still open.

dtcyzXx5LaCJfRzyitKuTw.text: This place was soooo much fun! Prepare for a possible 30 min wait! But it's worth the wait , fun fun fun . Food was great , experience was delightful ! Outside dining was excellent ! Allen was our server and made the experience that much more fun! Allen rocked ! Thanks

3VqhBmdg0QjPXUPcUOg5sQ.text: First time here, the waitress was extremely helpful on showing us how to eat the crawfish as i have never ate them before.  We ordered the get your feet wet deal which came with sausage, crawfish and shrimp, it also came with 2 red potatoes and 2 corn both corn and potatoes have no taste.  I got the hot and juicy sauce which to me was spicy but i dont like spicy food at all so if you like spice it probably wont be a problem for you.  For my first time eating crawfish it was okay its an expensive fish for the amount of meat in the shell, the sausage tasted like a kielbasa sausage but a little tender and then shrimp well tasted like shrimp, just like what i ordered if you want to get your feet wet this is a good place to start!

1Ao5xixPHioT2oBgML1Fuw.text: I've been here several times and have loved it so much more each time. If you enjoy flavorful seafood then you need to come here. Get a pound of shrimp and a pound of clams with a corn and potato in hot n juicy baby spice or mild. Simply the best! That combination will have you running back about every two weeks! The spice runs on the hotter side, my husband who eats siracha or tabasco sauce on everything thinks the medium is too hot for him at times so that's why I recommend baby spice or mild. Oh and don't forget the Cajun fries and fried oysters! ....man I'm going back to-day!

WRI_C0nLoFaKRLjw4_C9Jg.text: If you're into Cajun food, you'll love this joint. Everything is served Head on Tail on, which is how you know this is real deal. This place will do its best to replicate your southern grandmothers crawdad boil. Simply outstanding, strap a bib on and get after it.   Spring for a lobster, you won't regret it.

wOqHoUhpnnnZMv2OsDB81A.text: First time coming to this place. Loved the food, and my server Shelby made it even more enjoyable. Not only was she fast but personable and recommended Cajun crawfish which i was hesitant at first but she did a great job convincing me and she was right it was delicious. Thank you Shelby for making this experience that much better

e3td6ziS0CTC7fmyeyKusg.text: Awesome experience! Karol with a K took care of us! She definitely made our lunch experience better! Had the "spicy" shrimp "hot n juicy" style! Potatoes well well cooked the sausage was awesome too! Had the best tasting oysters I've had in phx so far! We also had A couple off beers and my girlfriend a couple of sangrias.  Thanks to Karol and her recommendations we had an awesome time. I really enjoy and  appreciate a dedicated worker that loves their job and specially the food they serve!

vXJ4fG-EX45BaBrBZgFWNg.text: I always go to hot and juicy to get some fresh or even frozen crawfish. Today my boyfriend and I decided to go have lunch here. I ordered 1lb of crawfish as usual. My crawfish were overcooked, it was all smoochy in other words they were nasty.  My boyfriend ordered shrimp with the hot and juicy seasoning with the spice level being spicy. He also ordered extra sauce as usual. When his food was given to him his shrimp were not spicy at all . The extra sauce looked like grease with garlic bits at the bottom and it was just warm not even hot . We stirred it to see if it would turn out like the sauce that we usually get but it didn't. I went to the bar and I told the girl that was there that the sauce that they had gave me didn't look like sauce. She then said you have to stir it , I told her I had stirred it before but it didn't work. She took it to the back supposedly to ask why the sauce looked like that . She came back and said that the sauce was made out of butter and that's how it should look . Not Very Satisfied I went back to my table and told my boyfriend wat they had said . The girl that was helping us passed by our table and I asked her about the sauce I told her that that didn't look like  the sauce that we usually get and she said we must of ordered something different Before, I  said no then I asked if they had changed the recipes she said no , so I said this sauce looks different from the other times that I had came to eat here she then said "they made it different today , they have changed the recipe" REALLY?  she just had said they had NOT changed it  , but Whatever . today will be my last day eating here . Doesn't come close to the hot and juicy in Hollywood !

ctWLGeMGFgt2jQIKnW96WA.text: Good option for Louisiana style seafood in the middle of the desert if that's your thing.    I've been to several places like Hot N Juicy and its is on par with previous experiences.  They serve everything from clams to crawfish to crab legs and chicken wings.  Each entree can be served with a combination of different sauces like garlic butter, hot n juicy, Cajun, lemon pepper, etc.  Additionally, each sauce can be served mild, medium, hot, extra hot, etc.  I thought the sauces lacked a little of the flavor that I'm used to.  If you are craving seafood in the West Valley, its a definitely a good option...actually its probably the best option conveniently located at West Gate.  Check it out!

VJE5hF73_mnb_CJ9KW_ISg.text: Came here Sunday night at 8. Was informed that there was a 45 minute wait and that they do not book reservations. You must be there to keep yourself in line which I think is annoying because now I have to wait. So to kill time, my family and I walked around Westgate until they texted us saying our table was ready. It was super busy but our server was attentive and friendly, making sure to check up on us. My little sister spilled soda and about 3 ladies came over to help clean, so I applaud them for that. We ordered a lot of crawfish, shrimp, Po Boys (chicken nuggets, wings, and chicken tenders one for the kids), fries, and a dozen oysters. Many of the crawfish were soft shell but I have to say the sauce/juice was good. Oysters are good as well, I think if they washed it a bit more then I would've enjoyed them more. Overall, I like it here.

dYZeABf_k_BPd-QSRTPYRA.text: My first time eating here. Carol and Maddie was so nice helping me out. (Injured guy from Hawaii) very friendly and professional staff. Price was good for the amount of servings. Would so recommend this place to everyone.

N02InOHNIGHEyA2VwVxBWw.text: Came in here with my rediculous family of around 20 people. We were loud and obnoxious but the staff was so proffesional and amazing! Our waiters were funny and went above and beyond to make sure we were happy.  The food was also just amazing. I am usually not a fan of crab but all the seasonings they had to choose from tasted delicious. Would definitely recommend the crab but I honestly loved everything I ate!  Pro tip: they give free samples crawfish and E what ever the soup was.

qH6CBhjDJWciPXRWjau6jw.text: I absolutely love love this place. I was so excited when they finally open one right by my house!!! Even though its always busy, the staff always comes around making sure to see if we need anything else. Place is nice and clean. They even have a place for u to sit outside . I go here so much , either to get it togo or enjoying it there. Totally recommend this place!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. So delicious!!!

ZSko54S6umE4Mq86i62Kug.text: This is mine and my husbands favorite place to eat we love the food and the beer purple haze goes perfect with the spice. We always start off with Cajun fries.

FRLH0t7Cr7DO-X4-t0wDSg.text: Let me just start by saying how is it possible that people are complaining about a SMELL of a seafood restaurant?! Get over it. Anyways, loved my experience here! Great relaxed atmosphere, love the spacious booths and all the TVs! Happy hour has a buy a beer get the next one for a penny deal! Boiled garlic shrimp and snow crab legs lemon pepper medium were so delicious. Prices were reasonable. Valentina took care of us and did such an amazing job  will be back!

kcDyrXCDzwA6M4IKXvQIJA.text: Good place for fun. We got the first option which is pretty good to feed 3 people. It had shrimp and crawfish with a lot of sausage, 2 potato and 2 corn. We also got the king crab legs which were a disappointment because it was all shell and no meat for $30. The waitress came once and was never seen again. Our drinks were never refilled and the waitress had to clock out so we got someone new. Which wasn't bad because he actually refilled our drinks and check up on us.

Kn9tpxhfgNWBphflAGU7Cw.text: Poor service, small portions and bad management. There are too many other good restaurants to eat at, don't waste your time or hard earned money here. I had a gift card and their machine wasn't working but after trying to convince them, they finally honored it. Two of my crab legs were empty. I told my party that they were my witnesses and sure enough when I brought it to the staff's attention, they told me it was impossible! Finally they brought me some more crab legs. This place has drastically gone down hill in the past six months. I will never go there again nor will I recommend it to anyone again.

ejqRmNqAjXZqNcqEbtbHNA.text: First time here. Was excellent. Started off by getting a table that we were not comfortable in, when we asked for another we were kindly and quickly accommodated even though it was really busy... Jordan our waitress recommended the juicy Louisiana mild. Was sooo good. Didn't wait long to eat. Nice night out on the patio. We will be back. Thanks Jordan for the good service.

fX_M2FDuX4-qJg3tguIDNA.text: 5 stars for the food for sure. I've tried their shrimp, lobster, calamari, and fried shrimp with fries. However, very pricy. I realize it's seafood, but still overpriced. That's my only complaint. Still, I will return. That's how much I like it!:)

_OJG0AtQne9vYQYrFLlsFg.text: The po boy had great flavor, but there were a total of 8 tiny shrimp on the entire sandwich. I had to move everything to one half to get the taste of shrimp. Server was friendly, but when we brought the fact that we were over charged to the manager she was less than friendly. She stated that the menus was wrong. I would get new menus before charging a dollar extra for everything and telling the customer they were wrong. So even if it says it comes with Cajun fries it is extra. FYI.

h3YTUlfIEsd6T2FROGJ5tA.text: Went there yesterday i usually go to the one in Tempe. I ordered lb of shrimp and a lb of crab legs cajun fries a beer and a sweet tea also ordered 2 pieces of corn. To start off the service was lousy the sauce on the seafood was oily and gross. It took the server like 20 minutes to bring the corn and it was hard and cold. The waitress should probably go work somewhere else serving is not for her. Lousy food lousy service i'll never go back $55.00 you can buy a lot of fresh shrimp and cook it yourself with that money.

t1qnW4c58tbBKtKt7HBurQ.text: Great location and wonderful food.  If the shtick is to have grumpy, disinterested service, then mission accomplished.  Bags of excellent seafood tossed in front of me and the rest of my party was rude.  Again, if that's the game, then let people know because that was a huge turn off.  Wish this could have been 4 stars, but bad service is an experience that good food cannot get past.

95SJh6to6GHgGEysotE7mQ.text: Great place if you like seafood or spicy food! You can get seated a lot quicker if you're ok with sitting outside. Otherwise the wait is like the usual 30 min or so. Our waitress, Marisela was super friendly and informative. She was on top of everything all night. Because it was our first time, she took the time to go through and explain the menu. The food came out super quick too! Hands down it was the fastest dinner I've ever gone out for. The only downfall was that we requested the heater to be turned on and it never happened, nor did anyone notify/apologize to us about it. Getting the check took longer than getting our food. And then depending on what day you go the parking could suck - definitely avoid game days!

zCQtgEbXTwxB52wocGvGxw.text: The food and service is great. Definitely paying for the experience. Love the king crab and shrimp! I gave it 4 stars because when we walked in nobody acknowledged us for a good 15 minutes. I get they were busy but a host should be available to provide wait expectations.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. Finally shelled the king crab
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. Breaking down the king crab! A must try..but I&#39;d recommend the garlic butter seasoning for it rather than the hot and juicy.
Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. They give you gloves and a bib

NC9aRTcM7_Un5FkOZjvvbA.text: BOMB. The service is great here and the food is BOMB. I usually order a lb of shrimp, some ice cold purple haze beer and a little rice on the side. The price is right and we always have a super cool server. My favorite is Andres, he's SUPER cool and provides the best customer service in the industry. I wish I had a restaurant, I would totally hire him!  Be careful with the spice level here though.. mild is pretty spicy, I might get baby next time. I always forget what i get lol.

QsYHzILqk9M0_vnFuDbK2Q.text: I completely understand why the reviews are low. I stopped by this place last night for the 1st time. After waiting 10 minutes with no acknowledgement, I decided to leave. My waitress must have been too busy to serve me. This spot was recommended by a friend. Since I grew up in the Shrimp and crawfish capital of the country, I come back today for lunch. My server was so much better. She got my order correct. The food is delicious. I loved the freshness and the spice. Too bad I had to come twice to be served once. On my way out, I spoke to the manager. The manager was not happy to hear what I had to say. This is a MUST try.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States. Half pound boiled shrimp and a shrimp poboy.

WKiZ1KJBJqzcysqI2FZD2g.text: I was at the cigar festival, approx 6pm I went into HNJ to order takeout. Hostess directed me to the terminals by the bar to order. There was a team lead Shelby and another server punching away at the terminals. Neither one looked up to greet me or say they would be with me in a minute. Waited 8.25 minutes. Shelby finally asked if she could help me. I said I need to order for takeout. She proceeded to tell me she was punched out already and would find me someone. She walked into the area by the bar. Said a couple things to other staff.  No one came to ask me for my order. After 3.5 more minutes. I flagged a staff member down and loudly stated I needed to order. I finally got my order in... Regardless of how busy servers are, they need to be trained to acknowledge customers

H9cnb7x1HjbbaBiMuqWFpg.text: Went tonight for dinner got to restaurant at 6.52 and left at 8.30 didn't get to eat all of our food it was too hot service was very very bad especially when  this is my favorite restaurant and eat at this place once a week this was by far the worst experience Shelby was our server and Nate was in training. I kept asking for drink refills and had to wait 10 minutes after asking. Asked for butter to calm our food never recieved it. And when you complain to Shelby about service she said she was in restroom cleaning feces off the wall but I was just in the restroom and it clean for once the other side of restaurant was closed and it wasn't busy for it to be horrible service.

sQCyv1ujEM_6FtsuJdoVWQ.text: Every time me and my wife come to this place, it's an awesome experience. We both LOVE seafood and are very harsh critics. Nothing but smiles from our server. Food is always brought within 10-15 minutes after ordering. Always hot, always juicy. I could just absolutely RAVE about this place. I've referred multiple friends and family, and they always say the same thing- We will definitely be coming back! Great place, Great food, Great prices. Thanks Hot and Juicy!

t-EVTCAb8AJxRDQYPOgLnA.text: Shrimp, crawfish and calamari were good. Had 3lbs of shrimp. Corn on the cob was soft to eat.

zULULLRq4mWpSuqAMpJLHQ.text: My friend and I came in to eat the other day and we both enjoyed the food and definitely the service. The host jeno was super friendly and made us feel right at home. He chatted with us for most the wait so the long wait flew by. We got sat and ordered our food which came out pretty quick but our server micah only came by once to see how we were doing. I also saw the host bussing tables while the servers were just standing around, seems unfair since the lobby was packed.

9yHkF04q83BgfOvVLVtr3Q.text: Such a disappointing service tonight. It's almost as if every time I come in, my service is never right. The last few times I've placed my orders for pick up and I've never had to deal with any service issues but tonight my best friend brought me in for my birthday.   It was Sunday evening around 4:30pm. It didn't look busy and they were only seating one side of the room. However they told us it would be a 15 min wait. I got a text message 5 mins later saying our table was ready. YAY! Once we were seated we saw new drink menus. I decided to try their new Craw on Mary drink and we placed an order for a pound and a half of shrimp.   After that our server never stayed the same throughout the night. We finished our shrimp bags pretty quick. (First meal of the day) and wanted to order more food. The service picked up since we arrived and there was probably 15 tables total.   I seen servers and managers running around like chickens with their heads cut off. Seemed as if they were overwhelmed with the dinner rush being there was also a line waiting outside the door. However, there seemed to be plenty of servers AND managers running around. With that said, it was still hard to get service. We had to flag someone down just to place another order and for drink refills. One manager came to pour my friend some water and spilled some on the table, smh!   Another manager had taken our second order and started running away except we weren't even done ordering..  After we were through with dinner we once again had to flag someone down for our bill and it took even longer for someone to come grab our book. My friend got so irritated she brought the bill up to the desk and the lady behind the counter says rudely, "are you ready to pay?" We weren't asked how everything was and there was no apology given for the wait.   This place has been open for sometime now. I don't understand the lack in customer service every time I dine in!

4lL2AlOlV5piwCI8eVdkcA.text: The food was ok. Catfish was ok.. not impressed I cannot remark on it. The ice tea was brown colored sweet water. The service was slow and unprofessional. My problem was the room was full of flies. Flies. Flies...the bathroom was disgusting and nasty. I have seen cleaner restrooms on the highway traveling across country.  My niece was visiting for lunch and I was showing her Westgate. This place was the only disappointment in our visit. So sad!!! Hot N Juicy... should be Hot N Nasty

Xrz3ibjIKMl42Q95HLCAaQ.text: All the "kids" that work here are literally doing whatever they can to avoid helping you at the bar or at your table.. understand your busy, but this is a restaurant.. this is your job... lol service sucks   The set up of getting drinks while eating is a joke.. why would i leave my table to go get a drink at the bar, that's what a server is for.

QudZs8MHvsYuw-Cv-FJE7g.text: Awesome!!! Food is Delicious please visit this place it's in a great location. HOT AND JUICY SEAFOOD THE BEST IN TOWN

AUC4vV7NbGfP6zOMA1xHSA.text: I always order take out or dine in and the sauce here is way better then Similar type of restaurant. I recently ordered take-out and Shelby helped me out and was very nice and went above and beyond to make sure my order was correct. Excellent food and service.  I will always come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Hot N Juicy Crawfish - Glendale, AZ, United States

VRT4pOFwAzkjzoS6eFd8Bg.text: I ordered the shrimp boil and it was quick and delicious! My waitress was great and service was top notch. When in the area again, I will be back.

G3G2vLR8x4fw-LPux3g9zg.text: Visiting from Texas and the food here was not as good nor seasoned as we are used to eating . The concept of serving in a bag and throwing shells out in buckets was unique, except our waiter never gave us a bucket, until the manager, Taylor came by our table and noticed. The waiter was busy, but wasn't meeting the needs of us and all of tables in our area. Fortunately, Taylor was very receptive to the customers and did everything he could to improve the service. Taylor's efforts made the difference for us to try this restaurant again, sometime.

j6D0n6NM3fynOH_3huNnAQ.text: Food was delicious, as always. There's good servers and there's not so good servers, you have to stay on them sometimes. It's busy which explains that stress in their faces, but overall good service. They gotta get better and timing the food and remembering to bring everything you ordered. At times your waiting knowing you shed for something like more bread or another# of seafood, but they completely forgot it. Little things that make that experience so much better with your family or friends when you come spending hard earned money. Still, great food, service could be better but I always feel happy when I leave. Oh! and kids food needs to come out as a priority to each table. Besides those few things im still going back...

6oJaXAv0th74UwYL-bSRXw.text: Really enjoyed our experience here. We have heard good things about the place, and decided to give it a try. It was a busy evening, yet the wait was less than 20 minutes. Server was prompt, and food was good. The only constructive advice I have is that they could use a teamwork approach, as our server often got busy, yet many other servers would walk right by completely ignore our needs. Empty water, out if napkins/paper towel, things like that. It's nice when other server step in as needed.  The food was very tasty. We had the shrimp, and crab. Loved the garlic flavored sauce.  Price was fair, and we will definitely be back.

XJkROAUEYkwb69Xf8wiHfw.text: Hot N SPICY Crawfishh !!! Mmmm mmm mmm ! This place is the hot spot for seafood ! AMAZING Cajun flavors ! The shrimp is a must; you wish you could take the meat out quicker it's so good ! Last but not least SHOUT OUT to SHELBY she was attentive; very professional but personable her appearance was beautiful as well as she was knowledgeable about the menu.

awkLAGKeyMqgoaoQsezf6Q.text: This was my first time here and I couldn't have had a better experience. Shelby was awesome. Not only was she attentive, you can tell she enjoys her job. I will be back!

3ZKj5KSYaZmQHu66ZN_WcA.text: Awesome place with awesome food. My fiance and I had Valentina as a server and she was the best! Even though it was super busy, the food came in a timely manner. Highly recommend!!

fiXNH3-l5iuaBhgC0DrPdg.text: Hella good food!! Me and my girlfriend are regulars here and every single time we come it's delicious!!! This most recent time we came, we were treated extremely well!! Valentina was our server and she helped us out with everything we needed!!Overall I would recommend this place to anyone!!

Exm06plGT2SR6d_mlBkhiw.text: I'm so glad they open around the area. Now we don't have to drive all the way to Tempe. Went there for the first time and it was an hour wait... The staff here isn't friendly or remorseful. Very unwelcoming. Also, the water here is disgusting.  I won't be coming back.

k_-JE7lRYB_IRLYByqfebQ.text: We tried it for the first time tonight. We are huge fans of Angry Crab but were at Westgate, so we decided to give it a try. Prices were pretty high, and you could only get one type of sauce added to your bag without having to pay extra. Asked for no spice but my face was on fire afterwards. Drink from the bar took well over 20 minutes and was very sweet and barely any alcohol. Asked for extra condiments, that came 5 minutes before leaving. Food was rubbery as well. Stick to Angry Crab if youre feeling a seafood broil.

72pXahxtF5yzqXDJGOfoqQ.text: OYSTERS on a half shell! These were fresh, plump and delicious. The crawfish and crawfish etoufee was alright, but the oysters brings me back every time.

YAdVeXcV5cdMh4XLIIiVAw.text: First of all, let me say that I am from the Deep South so I am very familiar with crawfish. After reading the history of this restaurant on their website, I can say with confidence that Vegas is not the place to learn about crawfish. Nothing in Vegas is real. It's all imitation. Unfortunately, this restaurant follows suit. Crawfish should be boiled live and dumped on the table with new potatoes and corn mixed in. Charging additional for those items is petty. I give the flavor good marks, but I understand what others meant about the service. Our server was very friendly, but somewhat slow. I think it is because the servers pool their tips, so individual effort is not necessarily rewarded.  If the restaurant is not terribly busy, it's definitely worth stopping in and giving it a try. If you are familiar with crawfish from the south, be prepared to pay extra for sides, tell them what kind of spice level you want and try to interpret what sauce you want. That's right, I said sauce with crawfish.

KzYK9VsXknesCYa-x5MsOg.text: I love getting crawfish here, baby spice, hot and juicy flavor, make sure you add some corn and potatoes and sausages. It's so bomb. Also, I order the oysters or blue crab here sometimes. Delicious! The only thing i dont like about this place is they mess up my order sometimes. But other than that, i still come here because of the food.

u-gXfAPcP3_QHu2sHVFiIw.text: The Westgate location is nice.  Not too noisy, service was great, place felt clean.  The food, however, is not quite my style.  I had the lobster, which comes swimming in a pool of garlic butter and spices inside a plastic bag.  I had to wear their (provided) plastic gloves, which became so slippery in the "butter bath" that I couldn't hold the nutcracker to open the lobster.  My husband, however, loves their food.  He gets clams and mussels, loves the taste, loves the whole experience.  The messy, slippery, spicy part just isn't for me.  I'm sure we'll go back and I'll try the fried shrimp, one of the few items available without the "bag and gloves".

WuDcLpBzBVoNfxJabFYh2w.text: Valentina was the best server!! Very attentive and the restaurant was amazing! 10/10 will come back!

M8MKtLPPYZsen6fgTdo_zg.text: Worst experience, question being charged for 2 (1/2) pounds of shrimp when I ordered 1 pound after asking the server to clarify I was ordering 1 pound as there is a $6 difference in price.  My bill was $91 as I ordered lobster.  This place and its management couldn't handle my questioning this simple item on my bill and called the police to force me to pay their incorrect bill. To top it off my drinks where late and the service was terrible.  This place is ran by incompetent people and when asked where on the menu you could not split an order, there was no place on the menu to support their charges.  BEWARE this place is a fraud ran by incompetent employees and needs competent management and serving staff.

3748wDFf5R0PEitv8Hf3Lw.text: Had a little bit of an upset stomach. Good flavor.  Don't order any of their sodas..coompletely flat. I would bring a bottle of ur favorite soda and ask for a cup of ice.  Service wise...you can tell majority of the workers don't like being there.

hWJAzTSG20n2rhZFZ6UoTg.text: the catfish was very good as was the fried calamari but a 40 minute was just too long. I was told that the normal wait time is 35 - 40 minutes....wish i had know that AHEAD of time!

0f-CnfA334LOlHlV1Sl0UQ.text: 4th time here & it's been nothing but good reviews. Shrimp was a bit off tonight... But maybe it was just tonight. Outside of that... Great staff great food great ambience!!!

ae77d_0n_-jOz9vbnLCYaA.text: I really like this place. The taste is awesome. My family use to go to CA for Boiling Crabs.  Since this place opened, we stopped going to Boiling Crabs. We love the crabs, shrimps, and crawfish. We come here every two weeks.  If you haven't try, I highly recommend giving a try.

nCayqRLmRs1nfzfxjpAI9w.text: My coworkers and I went here for birthday celebration and it is our first time to come here so we thought we'd try the food. Most of us ordered shrimp just different spiciness level. When one of us got the shrimp he ordered he saw a battery inside the plastic with the shrimp. We took the this picture before we call the manager. Good thing he looked at it first before he starts to eat it. Another that is upsetting is they still charged our friend. Q3xshjbtlZjEll5Dz_dTWQ.text: The food was great here! The seasoning was just where it needed to be- i first had an appetizer of oyster which were very good- the oyster were a great size and the food came out fast. It was very busy but the timing of the food was on point. For the meal I ordered shrimp and crab legs - 1lb spicy with hot and juicy mix. The flavor was perfect!! Perfect seasoning perfect spice!! I just came from the island of Hawaii where seafood was amazing and to find a place here that taste just as good was perfect! I would recommend this place to anyone that wanted crab legs in the desert!! They were extremely busy but the waitress were very attentive and very nice. Great place I would definitely come back.

BkHo0Kmpj4md9BO3L95TBA.text: The seafood and seasonings are good, no complaints on the food but awful, slow service for the price. You guys really need to bump your service. You guys are charging top dollar, make it a better experience.

BMKD73uzP0urmHWsrMB-AQ.text: Horrible.  Went here based on a referral from someon who said "if you like angry crab you should try hot and juicy".   Couldn't be further from the truth!!  Nothing about this place is better than Angry Crab. Not the shrimp, the sausages were tiny and not very tasty. The Softshell crab and the calimary were the saltiest things we have every tasted. We couldn't even finish them. The sauces are not hot even when we asked for spicy.  The drink orders got messed up at least 5x during the meal. The server girl had no clue or interest in what she was doing.  If you want good food of this type stick with Angry Crab. This place is all over the place.

biO6Hcpr47pxVBD9o1e6cw.text: AMAZING food. Always. Juicy, hot, well seasoned. If you haven't been in this place and love sea food, come here. The medium spice is just perfect to enjoy it without sweating.   I always order shrimp. I have tried everything but shrimp is the best by far. In my bag you will always find corn and sausages, the perfect combination for me.   I've been here a couple of times, some of them I've had waited over 40 mins. So don't get frustrated if you don't get a table right away if it's busy.   The only negative experience was my server. He was asked to bring the beer with the food and did the opposite. I asked for lemon and salt and pepper, I had to go an get it. I mean I know nobody is perfect, but that specific day wasn't even crowded. I love the food here, that is why I give the 5  s.

p6R7PkcT70Cbg1upnpsJMA.text: This is the best place to go for crawfish. It located at westgate in glendale and it have a lot of restaurants and bars around and also outlet stores. There are plenty of parking lots, but it can be busy when there's an event or game night.   When we came it was busy, they said it will be 45 min wait. We gave the hostess our cell num so that they'll text us when the table is ready. While we wait for the table, we decided to walk to the Yard House for a drink of beer and chit chat to kill time.  After we finish our drink, we received the text so we walk back to hot n juicy. Got seated and Leo was our server. Leo was friendly and energetic even when it's only an hour till closing time.   We ordered a pound of shrimps with heads on, a couple or corns and sausages, a dozen oysters and cajun fries. We pick spicy and it was just the right amount of spicy level. The shrimps, corns and sausages comes in the same bag and we just have to wear the gloves and the bib they provided for us and just dig in. I feel everytime I go here, the sauce and the spiciness has been very consistent, and the oysters is very sweet and refreshing! Sometimes I notice the service is not consistent everytime but I love the food here and Leo is great. He doesn't rush us and he let us take our time to order and he always come around to check on us see if we need anything else before the kitchen close.   This is the place to go for some delicious messy seafood!

Our food was delicious of course! They provide bibs and gloves.   We will be back if we are ever on that side of town.

ZP0Nrva29ger-E1iX4iD7Q.text: Mediocre crawfish po boy. Crawfish was overcooked in older grease. Just not that flavorful. The young lady that served me was just awkward. Timing was off. M-UeQxjI5_MeV_BQs8dkWA.text: Such wonderful flavor when you pick a sauce for the seafood of choice. My personal favorite is the shrimp spicy. I know crazy. But I love the heat. Cajun fries to set the taste buds a wild first n you know you are having a feast not a meal. Never shy from the unknown and order different things. Great food!

Had such a great amazing experience today our server was a huge part of it her name was " Monica " and was bilingual which made my plus one more comfortable since she didn't speak English she not only made sure everything was perfect but she was so attentive to anything  we may need always cane to check on us and her personality just enlightened the whole atmosphere I'm telling you if you ever come to this place make sure you have Monica be your server great person

c8TCKoRtmZjps_qqb45_rg.text: This is a combination score of the two times now that I have been to this restaurant.  The first time left a LOT to be desired. I ordered the pound of shrimp along with one other person at our table. The other two ordered crab. We also ordered potatoes and corn for the table. The shrimp was AWFUL. It had barely any flavor and hadn't been cleaned! I dont know about anybody else, but as soon as I see the pop trail still in my shrimp- meal OVER. So we sent those back and I was done with this place that time.  We decided to give it another try because frankly, it's close and there aren't many seafood restaurants in the area. This time was great. I stuck to the crab (I was not going there with the shrimp again) and it was good. We both ordered hot n juicy flavoring and I got mine medium spicy. It wasnt spicy at all, so next time I will got hotter. But, the seasoning was good and we were stuffed by the time we left. I would definitely go back again, but I will never do the shrimp again.

mBPMM_qiRcITkQxobMLKjg.text: Good seafood, and great service. Never had a bad experience here and I would totally recommend the catfish basket with cajun fries.

Je_wtlMfTwMfqtAOLXE16A.text: One of the best places to eat good seasoned shrimp in Arizona. They sell their seafood and crawfish by pound. One pound of shrimp is $13.00. I loved their concept!!  So you know how sometimes you don't want to eat shrimp with the skin and head in public because you're afraid you might be judged?! (lol). Do not be worried here. Their shrimp comes with the head and skin. It's simply the best as it holds all the flavor!!   They have different seasonings:   Louisiana  Juicy Cajun  Garlic Butter  Lemon Pepper  Hot n Juicy and their spice levels are: Baby Spice  Mild  Medium  Spicy  Extra Spicy.   My brother recommended juicy Cajun in spicy so that's what we got. My mom got the garlic butter in medium spice.   Hands downs the Cajun spicy shrimp was the winner for my hubby and me. I'm used to eating  spicy foods and I definitely won't be ordering the extra spicy as the spicy was hot enough for me. Delicious overall!! The shrimp was just cooked to perfection, not too boiled that it tasted mushy but just boiled enough that it was crisp but well cooked.   So they bring your shrimp inside a plastic bag mixed with all the goodies. You put plastic gloves and a plastic bib and you start eating! Nobody judges as everyone is eating the exact same way lol.   We also ordered their sweet potato fries and omg they were so delicious!    We will definitely be visiting this restaurant chain more often :)

FyuytjWxBE_SLRA_GMIvvg.text: I don't write negative reviews especially on restaurants but I have to tonight. This is absolutely the worst preparation of seafood I've ever had. Everything was over cooked. Completely disappointed. Maybe you'll have better luck here but I don't recommend this place to anyone.

g3DpGZY4rjfg3nSQBPucXw.text: I totally had so much fun here with my family and loved the experience. I wasn't expecting to eat out of plastic bags with no utensils or plates so be prepared for that. They give you rubber gloves to use if you don't want to get your hands dirty. There were five of us and we shared 2 orders of the "get your feet wet." This was plenty of food. Each order comes with 1 lb. shrimp, 1 lb. crawfish, corn on the cob, potatoes and a dozen andouille sausage pieces. We tried the garlic butter and lemon pepper sauces and both were good.  The seafood tasted fresh as well. I thought this was something different and unique and I can't wait to go back.

VfbyHMrt_G_jQC0okeWj6w.text: I'm not a sea food fan. I brought my family here to celebrate Mother's Day.  According to them it was delicious.  They've had the Hot n Juicy in Las Vegas and said it's just as good considering they're franchised.  As far as food that's not sea food related, it could do better. I wish the menu for alternatives would have been better. The only thing I liked was the cheese sticks and fries.

8ClaHidWnKWGgfw_Ji9fUQ.text: Ahhhhh! So many mixed emotions about this restaurant. Our first visit, as you can see wasn't awesome BUT it was also four years ago... we've been coming here off and on and every visit has been different, not awful but not the best. My husband and I visited this location last Saturday, which you would think "it's Saturday night, west gate is always busy" and of course, it was busy! We waited TWO hours to be seated, which they had mentioned when we first checked in. The moment she said two hours I was considering other restaurants, my husband (a stubborn man) had been craving Hot N' Juicy for weeks so I was cooperative. We decided to take a walk since it was obviously going to be a while, the moment we stepped outside, the patio had at least FIVE empty tables and about three in the small indoor section they have on the side.. We obviously came to the conclusion that they were short staffed. Finally, we were seated, ordered the moment we sat down and the wait for our food was not long, thankfully. Our waitress was awesome, but she checked on us ONCE  because she was so so so busy!!! I'm disappointed because we love their food so much but we walk in never knowing what to expect. If it was a holiday, I would be more considerate... it was just a Saturday night.

e2iOqD8yHxTJfR3xqGfB_w.text: Worst dining experience of my life. The hostess was so incredibly rude. She literally just stood there and gave me a blank stare when I walked in. I was the one who had to say hi and tell her that I was looking to dine in. And then she asked me for my number and name, I gave her my information and she didn't say anything to me she just turned her back. We waited over an hour. When she finally called us, I got up and expected her to tell me that my table was ready or something along those lines. But she literally just stood there with a blank stare and didn't say anything!!! I was the one who told her that she just called my party and then she said "oh" with an attitude and rolled her eyes.    The waitress who took our order was very nice and helpful.  Our food arrived pretty fast. However we did not have any utensils, condiments, gloves, bibs or trash bin.  We waited for about 10 minutes for a server to come back but she never did. I had to go look for our server but I didn't find her I asked another employee if she could help us out and she did. They took forever to gives us our check.  The restroom was incredibly disgusting. There was water and toilet paper all over the floor. They didn't have any soap.  The food was really good however the customer service sucks.

cXEPzGPYpFeO11OTXh4zRw.text: OH MY GOD, best place for crawfish!! We got the spicy crawfish, snow crab and shrimp and it was amazing definitely 10/10. If you get Shelby  Smith as a waiter she will not let you down. She helped us out picking what's best and will be asking her to wait on us everytime!

VbcS2o-nojR_fuZhJ8KRmA.text: This is probably my favorite place to get crawfish. I like this place better than Angry Crab. Their food always seems so fresh and they never disappoint me. I've been here many times before. It's a fun atmosphere and you can get messy with the food without getting judged! I've always had good service working here. Never had a problem. I love getting the crawfish or shrimp with the garlic butter sauce. A pound of crawfish is $12.99 and a pound of shrimp is $13.99. I normally get either 2lbs for myself. I recently got into their delicious oysters. They oyster either come in 6 or 12. It's super refreshing and I highly recommend getting it. I have to admit it's a little pricey but it's worth it! Definitely one of my favorite places if I'm in the mood for crawfish!
